title: Apply global visual identity (Deep Indigo palette + Inter) and replace global header logo

requirements.text: Add the uploaded logo image as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and standardize filenames so they can be referenced by the UI.

quotes: Pode colocar essa imagem no lugar da imagem que está no topo?

acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains new logo assets in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The filenames are stable and referenced consistently by the UI (no direct references to the raw upload filename in JSX).

requirements.text: Replace the current logo images in the global header (Topbar) with the new logo asset(s) generated from the uploaded image.

quotes: Pode colocar essa imagem no lugar da imagem que está no topo?

acceptanceCriteria: The Topbar no longer renders /assets/generated/firsty-logo-mark.dim_512x512.png and /assets/generated/firsty-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png; it renders the new logo asset(s) instead.
The header layout remains visually aligned (logo fits within the existing 64px header height without overflow).

requirements.text: Apply the provided color palette globally using Tailwind/Shadcn theme variables so Deep Indigo (#1A2B4C) is the predominant color, Slate Gray (#3E4A59) is used for body text, Ice White (#F4F7F9) is used for backgrounds, and Sage Green (#7A918D) is used only as an accent; ensure high contrast and avoid vibrant neon/pink/purple colors.

quotes:
E deixar o aplicativo dentro dessa identidade visual abaixo:
Azul Anil Profundo

`#1A2B4C`

Cores de Apoio

- Cinza Ardósia – `#3E4A59`
- Branco Gelo – `#F4F7F9`
- Verde Sálvia – `#7A918D`

Regras de uso

- O azul deve ser predominante
- Verde apenas como acento
- Priorizar alto contraste
- Evitar cores vibrantes (neon, rosa, roxo)

acceptanceCriteria: Primary actions, active navigation states, and key highlights use the Deep Indigo primary color.
Accent color (Sage Green) appears only in small highlight/accent contexts (e.g., badges, subtle indicators), not as dominant surfaces.
Text/background contrast remains readable in light mode across key screens (e.g., Login, Dashboard, Documents, Settings).

requirements.text: Set Inter as the default sans-serif font across the app and enforce the typography hierarchy: titles semibold, subtitles medium, body regular.

quotes:
Tipografia

Estilo:

Sans-serif moderna e funcional

Fontes recomendadas:

- Inter

Hierarquia

- Títulos: Semi-bold
- Subtítulos: Medium
- Texto corrido: Regular

acceptanceCriteria: Inter is loaded by the frontend (e.g., via index.html or CSS) and used as the default sans-serif font throughout the app.
Headings/titles render with semibold weight, subtitles with medium weight, and body text with regular weight (verified on at least Login and one internal page such as Dashboard).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only and must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit files listed in frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts/tsx).
nonGoals: Backend/canister changes (Motoko) are out of scope for this request.
Fixes to document upload/list behavior or localization work are out of scope for this request.

edits: Convert the uploaded logo into a square mark with transparent background (Variação do nome completo (1).png > firsty-logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
Convert the uploaded logo into a horizontal wordmark with transparent background (Variação do nome completo (1).png > firsty-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
